message.content:
cs.CL, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR. 

The paper proposes a novel architecture for movie story question answering, which involves both video and subtitle modalities. This suggests that the paper could belong to several sub-categories, including natural language processing (cs.CL), computer vision (cs.CV), artificial intelligence (cs.AI), machine learning (cs.LG), and information retrieval (cs.IR). Given that the paper focuses on language understanding and reasoning over video and subtitle data, cs.CL is the most likely sub-category. However, the paper also involves visual processing and modality fusion, which makes cs.CV and cs.AI likely as well. Finally, the paper uses machine learning techniques and evaluates its performance on benchmark datasets, which suggests cs.LG and cs.IR as possible sub-categories.
